en: American Samoa Lambert: Lambert Conic Conformal (1SP) (American_Samoa_Lambert)

Per Snyder: Map Projections - a Working Manual: At origin x=500000 ft; y=0 but radius to latitude of origin = -82000000 feet. Thus False Northing = 312234.65 ftUS. NGS confirms value of FN, which is encoded within their algorithms but not published.
Per Snyder: Map Projections - a Working Manual: At origin x=500000 ft; y=0 but radius to latitude of origin = -82000000 feet. US National Geodetic Survey confirms value for False Northing.
Per Snyder: Map Projections - a Working Manual: At origin x=500000 ft; y=o but radius to latitude of origin = -82000000 feet. US National Geodetic Survey confirms use of zero for False Northing.
American Samoa Lambert: Lambert Conic Conformal (1SP)
